thread.title: Three Homes That Let You Step Up in Style

author: Stacey Altherr
title: Three Homes That Let You Step Up in Style
text:
$18 million Longboat Key, Fla.
Six bedrooms, six full bathrooms, two half-baths
Located in Longboat Key Club, this 12,095-square-foot home on the Gulf of Mexico has two grand staircases: One from the entrance to a two-story portico, and a curved, two-sided one from the foyer to a formal living room. The home, built in 2002, has four guest... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
